pageTitle: Replace the lens: Canon SLR Lens Talk Forum: Digital Photography Review
textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply   Reply with quote   My recommendation - replace the lens I had a similar sharpness issue when I first picked up my 70-200 2.8 L IS II. I have a series of standard real-life images I shoot with all new lenses. I noticed that at 70mm the lens was immaculate. The longer the focal length and I noticed that from the extreme left of the frame to about 1/3 from the left there was noticeable drop of sharpness as compared to the same part of the frame on the right side. By 200mm, the results were completely unusable
